attributes.action: tax the migrants that send money out of our country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: if you tax the money sent from Britain (formally GREAT BRITAIN)BY Migrant workers maybe they would not be so keen to come over and rob our country of everything they can , i can see this country going down hill very quickly .

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
